title: Mexicans increase investment in U.S.-ForEx effect

content.question: If Mexicans increase their investment in the United States, the supply of Mexican pesos to the foreign exchange market and the dollar price of the peso will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Increase

Increase

Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Increase
 Decrease

Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Decrease
 Increase

Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Decrease
 Decrease

Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Decrease
 No Change

content.answer:
Supply of Pesos
 Dollar Price of Peso

Increase
 Decrease

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
